Mailing Address: c/o Municipal Hall2760 Cameron RdWest Kelowna, BC     V1Z 2T6
Service Details: - Offers a facility that accommodates practices, games and tournaments in a variety of ice sports, including minor hockey, adult rec hockey, figure skating, ringette and public skating- Facility is available for concerts and trade shows- Also has an indoor walking track, an entry-way courtyard for small outdoor events and a part-time concession which opens during Warriors' games, major events and tournaments- Home to BC Hockey League's West Kelowna Warriors
Hours: Please visit our website for program times and hours of operation
